title: Open Channel Management - HydraulicSimulationResult
description: Made for Open Channel Management (raw-water systems)

dateCreated.description: Property. Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

description.description: Property. An optional text that describes other significant information about the simulation scenario

createdBy.description: Property. [todo!] Denotes the user who created this result

hasInputOpenChannelSystem.description: Property. The URI of the OpenChannelSystem this result is referring to

computedBy.description: Property. the URI of the HydraulicSimulationScenario this result has been computed
